response.original_title: 清水ミチコ大感謝祭 in 武道館～作曲法SPECIAL～
response.overview: Michiko Shimizu's live performance at the Budokan, a New Year's tradition. This time, we will deliver the definitive edition of the "composition method" series that Shimizu captures the characteristics of each artist! A long-awaited new work by fans will also be shown...! Michiko Shimizu's 8th performance at the Nippon Budokan in Tokyo, which has become a tradition of the year-end and New Year holidays. In 2022, we will deliver the definitive edition of the "Method of Composition" series. This is a popular series in which Shimizu writes and sings original songs based on the imagination of "this artist will compose like this." Sakanaction, Mr. The repertoire of successive generations such as Children and Ringo Shiina, as well as new works by major artists such as Official HIGE DAN dism and Kazumasa Oda will be showcased. A must-see live performance with a variety of productions and expressiveness that will definitely make you burst out laughing.
response.title: Michiko Shimizu Grand Appreciation Festival in Budokan ~Composition Method SPECIAL~
